alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe; Northern Cayuga; Northern Erie; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 17 at 4:06PM EDT until May 18 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Widespread frost with sub-freezing temperatures in the lower 30s expected, including in outlying areas of Buffalo and Rochester. Temperatures near the Lake Erie and Lake Ontario shores will be in the middle 30s with patchy frost. * WHERE...Monroe, Wayne, Northern Cayuga, Northern Erie, and Genesee counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Monroe; Northern Cayuga; Northern Erie; Wayne
